attributes.action: Hand FIFA's Olympic Tickets allocation to British Sports fans
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government, given the recent comments made by Sepp Blatter, to reallocate the 1500 Olympic Tickets destined for a clearly corrupt organisation that is headed by someone who thinks Racism in football can be resolved with a handshake, to sell or donate FIFA's ticket allocation to British Sports Fans or Charities.
FIFA must be reformed, the British Government can help push forward this reform!

rejection.details:
The responsibility for all aspects of staging the Games, including ticketing, is that of the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games (LOCOG) who are a private organisation operating independently of Government.

LOCOG can be contacted by writing to: London 2012, One Churchill Place, Canary Wharf, London E14 5LN; Tel: 0203 2012 000; or email: enquiries@london2012.com.
